question: What will be the price of Bitcoin (BTC/USD) on [DATE]?
description: Predict Bitcoin's price at market resolution. Current price: $[CURRENT_PRICE]
resolutionCriteria:
This market resolves using the Bitcoin (BTC/USD) price reported by CoinGecko at [TIME] UTC on [DATE].

The final price will be floored to the nearest dollar for settlement.
Only the CoinGecko API will be used as the data source.
In case of any downtime, the last available price before resolution will be used.
Market range: $[MIN_VALUE_FORMATTED] - $[MAX_VALUE_FORMATTED]
